title: Kirchhoff junction - 12 V with 3 4 and 12 ohms

content.question: Three resistors are connected to a <math alttext="12 volt" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math> battery, as shown in the figure.
